group_1.textLeft: Yaaah!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3037A02][chara:300500:effect_shake][chara:102800:effect_shake][se:4061_landing_jump5]...Wha?!

group_1.textLeft: (Huh?! They didn't get sent into the labyrinth?!)
(That makes this four against one.@This is really, super, ULTRA bad news!)

group_1.textRight: (What on earth just happened...?)
(No, this is no time to be mulling over@the [textYellow:Kimochi]'s rules.)

group_1.textLeft: How are you still fighting?!@What happened to the [textYellow:Kimochi]'s rules...?!

group_1.textRight: Why did she suddenly attack us in the first place...?
...Nanaka, what should we do?@We had not anticipated this.

group_1.textLeft: That depends on how well she recognizes us.
I don't want her to mistake us for Magical Girls@from the Union.
For now, let's see if we can't clear up@any misunderstandings
and settle this peaceably.
That would be the best way to settle this@with the least fallout.

group_1.textRight: ...Are you a Magical Girl from Takarazaki City?
Why did you suddenly strike out at us?
If it's a matter of territory...@then I won't hunt Witches around here.
Please don't be concerned about that.

group_1.textLeft: Don't play dumb with me.
...You're all Kamihama Magical Girls, aren't you?
Then you definitely recognize this cutie's face.

group_1.textRight: ...That aside, I don't belong to the Union.

group_1.textLeft: I don't know and I don't care.
Considering how info spreads like wildfire@around Kamihama's Magical Girls,
if even one of them knows about this, I'm toast.
Trying to convey to her that we're not part of@the Union...isn't working.

group_1.textRight: I don't know why the [textYellow:Kimochi]'s rule isn't kicking in@here, but
we're only up against one person.@Let's retreat and report back right away.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.@Sharing the knowledge that she's still alive here
could save the lives of many Magical Girls.
However, I'd like to do something about@the memory she has of us
in order to prevent us from being targeted@by the Neo-Magius's vengeance in the future.
With that said, might I ask for your assistance,@Meiyui?
I want you to make her believe that our meeting@here never happened.
Our current situation is a very favorable 4-against-1.
I think it's possible to keep her in check.

group_1.textRight: I was thinking the same thing.@Yes, that's possible to do with my power.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: But I need to touch my opponent in order to use@my unique magic.
Can the rest of you make an opening for me?
Yes!

group_1.textLeft: I'm on it!

group_1.textCenter: Although we have the advantage in terms of@numbers, she's still the Neo-Magius's leader.
There's no telling what she may do.

group_1.narration: "Listen: The goal is to bring this information@back to Kamihama,@and make the Neo-Magius leader believe@she's never met us before."
"We needn't defeat or capture her.@All we have to do is create an opening@for Meiyui to strike."
"And, of course...@Everyone, please value your own safety first."

group_1.textCenter: There's no need to go risking your lives.

group_1.textRight: [se:4012_equip_arms_longspear2_vh][chara:102800:effect_7000_attack01]Take this!

group_1.textLeft: Wha?!

group_1.textRight: Yah!

group_1.textLeft: [se:4061_landing_jump5][flashEffect:flashWhite2][chara:300800:effect_shake][chara:102800:effect_shake][surround:3037A02]Guh!
(If they all come after me at once,@I'm totally screwed!)
(All I can do is defend...@I don't have any chance to find an opening!)

group_1.textRight: [se:4061_landing_jump5][chara:102800:effect_7001_attack02]Haaah!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102800:effect_7003_damage02][se:6105_hit_slash_03_v][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Kyaah!
Shoot...

group_1.textCenter: (I will make you believe that our meeting@never happened...!)
...Hold up, what's this cutie doing here?
Oh, right,@I was asked to come tidy up the warehouse.

group_1.textLeft: Whew... We made it out.

group_1.textRight: Meiyui's magic...was amazing as always, wasn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Falsification of the truth...@not changing the target's perception,
but rather disguising the "truth" they saw...
Quite a useful ability, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: But it's not omnipotent.@If she catches on, it's all over...
We must hurry back to Kamihama City before that@happens...!

group_1.textLeft: [se:7201_detect_magic][chara:300500:effect_ef_adv_01][chara:301200:effect_ef_adv_01]?!

group_1.textRight: I was concerned that she was running late,@so I came to check on her...
It seems you've been picking on our Princess@a fair deal.
Your magic seems quite useful. However...
Every ability has a loophole, doesn't it...? Hmhm.

group_1.textLeft: Hmph...
